mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER OVER (ORDER BY #{orderType}) rnum FROM review WHERE place_id=#{placeId} ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN (page-1)*20 AND page*20
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review(index, place_id, user_id, score, date, content) VALUES (#{index}, #{place_id}, #{user_id}, #{score}, #{date}, #{content})
